Nothing is better than the merit of leaving the household life.
Carrying the river of love in the cycle of birth and death,

The three realms and the four kinds of kindness,

If one child leaves the household life,

Liang Cai abandons the body and life of this world,

Their thoughts not clinging to anything.
Study the king of the country of Pure Rice,
Imitate the holy queen Māyā.
At some other time in the future,
They will meet in the Buddha's assembly.
On this day, now is the time.
For now, we will part ways.
It is not that I am suddenly going against your kindness.
It is just that time does not wait for people.
Therefore it is said:
If this body is not liberated in this lifetime,
in what other time will this body be liberated?
I humbly hope that you will keep this in mind and not think of me.

original: 未了心源度數春　　翻嗟浮世謾逡巡
analyzed: 未了心源度數春　　翻嗟浮世謾逡巡

analyzed: 幾人得道空門裏　　獨我淹留在世塵

analyzed: 謹具尺書辭眷愛　　愿明大法報慈親
translated: I carefully write this short letter to bid farewell to my loved ones, wishing to repay my kind parents by illuminating the great Dharma.

analyzed: 不須洒淚頻相憶　　譬似當初無我身

The road has suddenly gone through thousands of miles.

Concentrating their thoughts on emptiness.
Do not give rise to feelings of separation.
Do not hope to lean on the door.
The family affairs at home.
Just go with the times.
The more you have, the more you have.
Increasing afflictions day by day.

He must seek the fish in the water.
My younger brother does his best to serve.
He also weeps for the bamboo in the frost.
When a person lives in the world.
Cultivating oneself and practicing filial piety.
To accord with the mind of Heaven.

To repay the kindness of our parents.
Now, thousands of mountains and myriad waters.
Far separated on the two paths.
One sheet of paper with eight lines.
